post: From Yannick: >>For once, I tend to agree with Mr. Berry… How many Shroud “conférences” have been done since the STURP examination? A ton! And what is the outcome of all those things? Not much frankly… After all these “conferences”, I wonder why there never been one serious global test plan proposal that could have been submitted to the Turin authorities for a new series of tests. I’m not aware of even just one! To me, all these “conferences” are like watching a one man show after the other, after the other, after the other… And I still wait to see one real concensus effort coming out of this…<< The authorities in Turin and Rome are the problem here, not the people who hold Shroud conferences. What would you like "Shroudies" to do, call Danny Ocean, organize a heist, and steal the Shroud so that they can do more tests on it? I think we've got the plot for "Ocean's 14"….
